message: The COVERAGE field for indicator 8-8-1, translated into en
data:
Data availability: Data for this indicator is available for 87 countries and territories.

Time series: The submission covers data from 2000 to 2019.

Disaggregation:

This indicator should be disaggregated by both sex and migrant status.

Wherever possible, it would also be useful to have information disaggregated by economic activity and occupation.
